name: Uchūsen Gamma
overview: This is a single-player classic shoot’em up with smooth vertical scroll. In order to complete the game you must reach the end of each stage and destroy the final enemy. There are 5 stages. At the end of each stage, bonus points will be awarded for the number of enemies destroyed, the number of full chains (9 enemies destroyed in a row), and for not losing a life on that stage.
